highlights.text:
What's the cost of a choice?
It's what you give up

books.title: The sun is also a star
books.author: Nicola Yoon

highlights.text: In America, the family name is called the last name. Dae Hyun said if showed that Americans think the individual is more important that the family.

There’s a pure kind of joy in the certainty of belief. The certainty that your life has purpose and meaning. That, though your earthy life may be hard, there’s a better place in your future, and God has a plan to get you there. That all things that have happened to him, even the bad, have happened for a reason.

Where did all those feelings go? People spend their whole lives looking for love. Poems and songs and entire novels are written about it. But how can you trust something that can end as suddenly as it begins?
